title: Difference between new and old library schedules

content.description:
Please note, on the exam administered each May, the Listening multiple-choice questions appear first and the Reading multiple-choice questions appear second.

You will read a selection in Chinese. Each selection is accompanied by a question(s) in English. For each question, choose the response that is best according to the selection. Chinese texts appear here in both traditional and simplified characters.

Read this note.

(Traditional characters)

小明：

你好！聽說期末考一結束你就回家了，昨天才回來。你可能還不知道學校前天發了通知，告訴我們學校圖書館的開放時間有些變動。早上開館的時間提前了半個小時，晚上閉館的時間推遲了半個小時，週末也一樣。這對我們寫畢業論文很有利。今天下午我再給你打電話，商量一下晚上去圖書館查資料的事。

張宏

8月29日

(Simplified characters)

小明：

你好！听说期末考一结束你就回家了，昨天才回来。你可能还不知道学校前天发了通知，告诉我们学校图书馆的开放时间有些变动。早上开馆的时间提前了半个小时，晚上闭馆的时间推迟了半个小时，周末也一样。这对我们写毕业论文很有利。今天下午我再给你打电话，商量一下晚上去图书馆查资料的事。

张宏

8月29日
content.question: How does the new library schedule differ from the old one?

choices.label: Weekday hours have changed, but weekend hours remain the same as before.
The library closes half an hour earlier in the evening.
The library is open longer each day.
The library opens later in the morning.

content.answer: The library is open longer each day.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Interpret the meaning of a text.
